description.p: This ballot package contains a module package that contains a set of application modules to record:

ul.li: physical quantity spaces, and their tensor order;
physical quantities, their symmetry and their identification with respect to a scale;
a physical quantity that is a property of a physical object; and
a physical quantity that is possessed by each member of a class of physical object, i.e. is a necessary condition for membership of the class.

description.p: This ballot package contains a module package that contains a set of application modules to record:

cvs_tag.description: Modules tagged for release to convener for QC review.
